verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus our glory, Jesus our song! Sing hallelujah, all the day long. Jesus our glory, Jesus our song! Knowing His headship all the day long.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We fight together; Canaan is ours! What foe could vanquish corporate power? United under Jesus our head, Into the glorious heavenlies we’re led!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
